oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Announcement - Brad Paisley Love And War video album launch - 2017-04-23. Part one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Event surrounding the launch of the 2017 Band Against Cancer initiative by Sarah Cannon, the Cancer Institute of HCA, in partnership with Brad Paisley and Sony Music Nashville. Event held at the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 23, 2017. Includes introductory remarks pertaining to the screening of the music video album for Paisley's Love And War project. Does not include audio from the video album. Part one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brad Paisley; Randy Goodman;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments from Sony Music Nashville CEO Randy Goodman / (06:09) Comments from the President of ETA Productions Ellen Appleton / (10:35) Comments from Sarah Cannon CEO Dee Anna Smith / (11:20) Audio from Band Against Cancer video / (13:21) More comments from Dee Anna Smith / (15:36) Introduction of Brad Paisley / (15:52) Opening comments by Brad Paisley / (17:08) More comments from Randy about the launch of Love and War and its accompanying video album / (18:39) Brad talks about the idea to create a video album after creating the music video for Today and the making of the video album / (20:35) Screening begins of the Love And War visual album /(20:52) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Paisley, Brad; Goodman, Randy; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
